title: Lisa Haydon shows off her baby bump as she holidays with her girl gang

organizations.name: lisa haydon swimwear & bikini photos  motherhood

text:
Lisa Haydon shows off her‚Ä¶ Lisa Haydon shows off her baby bump as she holidays with her girl gang Lisa Haydon is enjoying her pregnancy to the hilt as she chills with her girl gang - view pics! By Urmimala Banerjee | Published: February 4, 2017 5:15 pm Lisa Haydon Swimwear & Bikini Photos 
Motherhood is certainly suiting Lisa Haydon , who is glowing by the day. The lovely lady who announced her pregnancy with a post on Insta a few days back is off on a vacation with her girlfriends. The ladies are soaking up the sun, enjoying the beaches and a bit of adventure sports. Yes, Lisa is living it up to the fullest. She got married to British entrepreneur, Dino Lalvani last year in an intimate ceremony in Aman Resorts, Phuket. Her web-series The Trip is on air on Bindass but the lady walked out of a film reportedly because of the fact that she was expecting. (Also Read: 5 times when a pregnant Lisa Haydon tried to HIDE her baby bump ‚Äì view pics) 
The gorgeous babe is wearing a printed two piece in classic Brazilian style with her hair loose. Lisa has posed for stunning snaps against the sunset and the dusky beauty is exuding oomph. She was accompanied by model friend Gabriella Demetriades, who is known in India‚Äôs fashion circuit. A photo posted by Lisa Haydon (@lisahaydon) on Feb 3, 2017 at 4:40am PST

It seems like her hubby, Dino also joined her for a break. Lisa was dating him for a year before she decided to tie the knot. He is the son of famous businessman Gullu Lalvani. Stay tuned to Bollywood Life for more updates‚Ä¶
